titleStmt.title: The holy history. Written in French by Nicolas Talon. S.I. and translated into English by the Marquess of Winchester.
Histoire sainte. English
titleStmt.author: Talon, Nicolas, 1605-1691.
Winchester, John Paulet, Earl of, 1598-1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. W. for J. Crook and J. Baker, and are to be sold at the Ship in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Title from letterpress title page which is on verso of first leaf; engraved title page is on facing page.
Letterpress title page is in red and black.
Thomason copy imperfect: significant bleed-through of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Ship in St. Pauls Church-yard
